title: Workflow Execution Failures Anomaly
description: This monitor uses anomaly detection to identify unusual spikes in n8n workflow failures. Anomalous failure patterns may indicate external service issues, configuration changes, or infrastructure problems.

definition.name: [n8n] Workflow Execution Failures Anomaly
definition.query: avg(last_10m):anomalies(sum:n8n.workflow.failed.count{*} by {workflow}.as_rate(), 'agile', 3, direction='above', interval=300, alert_window='last_10m', count_default_zero='true', seasonality='hourly') >= 1
definition.message: {{#is_alert}}Anomalous spike in workflow failures for {{workflow.name}}. Failure rate significantly higher than baseline.{{/is_alert}}{{#is_warning}}Workflow {{workflow.name}} showing unusual failure patterns.{{/is_warning}}{{#is_recovery}}Failure rate for {{workflow.name}} returned to normal patterns.{{/is_recovery}}

options.escalation_message: Anomalous failure pattern persists. Immediate investigation recommended.
